todos.content: Identify Crush as the installed LSP-enabled program
Create LSP configuration file for Crush (initial attempt)
Update Crush's main configuration with LSP server definitions (corrected format)
Create additional configuration in Crush's config directory (corrected format)
Verify all LSP servers are accessible
Create verification script to confirm configuration
Fix Crush configuration format to match required structure (first correction)
Fix Crush configuration format after error detection (second correction)
